name: GoBattle.io
description:
Battle to be the King!

This is an alpha version of our new game GoBattle.io . The game is still in development, please comment below to request features. All the feedback is appreciated.

Controls:

  • Left/Right keys - Move
  • Up key - Jump
  • Down key - Cover
  • Space bar - Fire

Currently, we are working on:

  • New weapons
  • Multiple power level on weapons
  • CPU controlled enemies
  • More maps
  • Team game modes (capture the flag, etc..)
